page.title: 17ARTISTS IN LILLIESLEAF
page.content: { { {ROB HAIN}IS AN ARTIST WHO LIVES NEXT DOOR TO LILLIESLEAF SCHOOL. HE MOVED HERE FROM ENGLAND,WHERE HE WENT TO ART COLLEGE. HE SPECIALISES IN{LANDSCAPES AND AT THE MOMENT HE IS CONCENTRATING ON BIRDS EYE VIEWS OF HIS GARDEN.HIS GARDEN IS FULL OF TREES AND COLOURFUL PLANTS,A CHICKEN RUN,SO THIS GIVES HIM LOTS OF IDEAS.HE IS BUILDING A STUDIO ON TO HIS HOUSE FOR PAINTING.HE EXHIBITS IN MUSEUMS AND ART GALLERIES IN THE AREA. THE {LILLIESLEAF POTTERY}WAS OPENED IN THE SUMMER OF 1981.{LINDA}AND{RANKIN {KINSMAN-BLAKE}CAME HERE FROM STOKE ON TRENT.THEY LEARNT THEIR SKILLS AT STOKE ON TRENT COLLEGE.THEY GET THEIR CLAY FROM STOKE AS WELL.THEY SELL TO TOURISTS AND SHOPS AND RESTAURANTS.THE TOURISTS COME FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD.
